: : Hollywood/Sting : :

Hollywood turned to look at Diesel and Razor.

Hol=
lywood:  Oh, hey guys.  The ship has a lot of goodies.  On these disks, is =
every byte of data on this computer, including a map of the whole Earth, an=
d it maps the locations of the transformer factions here too, and other stu=
ff.  Right now brothers, I'm just checking the quality of the parts of the =
ship.  It could possible serve useful to attach it to our own base.

Meanwh=
ile, Sting comes out of his CR Chamber.  He was formerly black and white, a=
nd although it was fitting, not only did he get the logo, but all the white=
 on him was replaced with red.  He sees that the entrance is open, and exit=
s the base.  He then sees that Diesel, Razor and Hollywood are inside the s=
hip.  He walks in.

Sting:  Oh,  hey guys.  What have you done here so far,=
 Hollywood?

Hollywood:  Oh, nothing much brother, I've contained all the d=
ata stored on the ship onto these disks, and I'm just taking a look at the =
equipment.

---------------------------------------------------------------=
-----------------------
The preceding announcement has been paid for by the=
 
New World Order


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  =
To: Neo Beast Wars 
  Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 10:44 PM
  Subject: nWo=
 base


  : : Razor / Diesel : :

  Both Razor and Diesel come out of the C=
R chambers. Razor was already black and white, the only change was the nWo =
logo. Diesel retained his black and silver, again only the nWo logo was new=
.

  They looked around seeing that Hollywood was gone.

  Razor: Maybe he =
is in the ship.

  They both walk out and notice that the doors are open. T=
hey climb into the ship.

  Diesel: Find anything worthwhile Hollywood?

  =
**********************************************************************

e preceding has been paid for by the
  New World Order
